title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance
author: Grant, James
snippet: " Ou, that will be lang enow; but tak' tent o' mywords; hear ye nocht, and see ye nocht; or I maycome doon by the Mossend some braw nicht, and themiln o' Kirkforthar will be toom o' a tenant in themorning; keep close by your ingle cheek, carle, for thechields o' Clatto winna thole steering."
